sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM Basis.BIN_ProductPrice WHERE BIN_ProductID = #productId# AND Type = '2'
sqlMap.select: SELECT BIN_ProductVendorID AS proVendorId, BarCode AS barCode, ValidFlag AS validFlag FROM Basis.BIN_ProductVendor WHERE BIN_ProductID = #productId# ORDER BY ValidFlag DESC
SELECT BIN_ProductVendorID AS proVendorId, BarCode AS barCode FROM Basis.BIN_ProductVendor WHERE ValidFlag = '1' AND BIN_ProductID = #productId#

SELECT BIN_ProductID ,BIN_ProductPriceID,SalePrice,MemPrice,StartDate,EndDate FROM Basis.BIN_ProductPrice WHERE BIN_ProductID = #productId# AND Type = '2' AND (StartDate <= #businessDate# AND EndDate >= #businessDate#)
SELECT BIN_PrtCatPropValueID AS propValId FROM Basis.BIN_PrtCatPropValue WHERE BIN_PrtCatPropertyID = #propId# AND PropValueChinese = #propValueCN# AND BIN_PrtCatPropValueID <> #propValId#

SELECT TOP(1) BIN_ProductID, BIN_ProductPriceID, SalePrice, StartDate, EndDate FROM Basis.BIN_ProductPrice WHERE BIN_ProductID = #productId# AND Type = '2' AND StartDate >= #businessDate# ORDER BY StartDate
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE Basis.BIN_ProductPrice SET
SalePrice = #salePrice#,
MemPrice = #memPrice#,
EndDate = #endDate#,
WHERE BIN_ProductPriceID = #productPriceID#

UPDATE Basis.BIN_ProductVendor SET ValidFlag= #validFlag#,
BIN_ProductVendorID = #proVendorId#
BIN_ProductID = #productId#

UPDATE Basis.BIN_Product SET BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId#, BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId#, UnitCode = #unitCode#, NameTotal = #nameTotal#, StandardCost = #standardCost#, OrderPrice = #orderPrice#, IsBOMCompatible = #isBOM#, Status = #status#, Mode = #mode#, ValidFlag = '1', IsStock = #isStock#, OriginalBrand = #originalBrand#, ItemType = #itemType#, Color = #color#, Profit = #profit#,
IsExchanged = #isExchanged#,
Version = #tVersion#+1,
WHERE BIN_ProductID = #productId#
